heading: Today
text: Any sun giving way to clouds. Afternoon rain showers developing.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Rain changing to snow west, then east late.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mix of rain and snow, changing to snow.
temperature: Upper 20s to mid 30s east of the Greens, teens to mid 20s west

heading: Thursday
text: Morning snow tapering to snow showers.
temperature: 15 to 25 north, 25 to 35 south, steady or falling
